text: Donald McAlpine is an Australian cinematographer. He was born in 1934 in New South Wales, Australia. He has been involved in over fifty movies. His more recent work has been seen in Baz Luhrmann's hit musical Moulin Rouge! (2001), for which he earned an Academy Award nomination, Adam Sandler's Anger Management (2003), Universal Pictures' Peter Pan (2003) and the Walt Disney/Walden Media-produced The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005). == Other websites == * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Australian filmmakers Category:People from New South Wales Category:Cinematographers
title: Donald McAlpine
